description: [BitPaymer](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0570) can use the tokens of users to create processes on infected systems.(Citation: Crowdstrike Indrik November 2018)

external_references.description: Frankoff, S., Hartley, B. (2018, November 14). Big Game Hunting: The Evolution of INDRIK SPIDER From Dridex Wire Fraud to BitPaymer Targeted Ransomware. Retrieved January 6, 2021.
